pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:0.5: 34. The training rule on not having someone nursed
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.2: At that time a disciple of the nun Thullanandā was suffering, but Thullanandā neither nursed her nor made any effort to have someone else nurse her.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.3: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.4: “How can Venerable Thullanandā not nurse a suffering disciple, nor make any effort to have someone else nurse her?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.5: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā didn’t do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.8: “… How can the nun Thullanandā not do this?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.9: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.10: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:1.11.1: ‘If a nun does not nurse a suffering disciple, nor makes any effort to have someone else nurse her, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.8: a student is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.11: Nor makes any effort to have someone else nurse her:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.12: she does not ask anyone else.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.13: If she thinks, “I won’t nurse her, nor will I make any effort to have someone else nurse her,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.1.14: If she does not nurse, nor makes any effort to have someone else nurse, a pupil or one who is not fully ordained, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.2.3: if she searches but does not find a nurse;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.2.7: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc34:2.2.8: The fourth training rule is finished.
